title: Flight Simulator 2020 - Addon spotlight - BetterToolbar for MSFS
description:
Do you also want to get rid of the handle bar which is continuously shown at the top of the screen and ruins your pictures and videos? In that case this is definitely a mod which is something for your. In this video we will do a very quick review of a nice mod which a lot of people will be happy with.

The mod discussed in the video can be downloaded 
https://flightsim.to/file/19879/bettertoolbar-for-msfs
